items.name: Component_TintAnimation
items.content:
# ===================================================================
#
#   Script: Component_TintAnimation
#
#   $$COPYRIGHT$$
#
# ===================================================================
class Component_TintAnimation extends gs.Component_Animation
    ###*
    * Executes a tint-animation on a game-object. The tint is executed on
    * the game object's tone-property.
    *
    * @module gs
    * @class Component_TintAnimation
    * @extends gs.Component_Animation
    * @memberof gs
    * @constructor
    ###
    constructor: (data) ->
        super
        
        @sourceTone = data?.sourceTone
        @targetTone = data?.targetTone
        @easing = new gs.Easing(null, data?.easing)
        @callback = null
     
    ###*
    * Serializes the tint-animation into a data-bundle.
    *
    * @method toDataBundle
    ###    
    toDataBundle: ->
        easing: @easing,
        sourceTone: @sourceTone,
        targetTone: @targetTone
     
    ###*
    * Updates the tint-animation.
    *
    * @method update
    ###      
    update: ->
        super 
        if not @easing.isRunning then return
        
        @easing.updateValue()
        a = @easing.value
        
        @object.tone.red = Math.floor((@sourceTone.red * a + @targetTone.red * (255 - a)) / 255)
        @object.tone.green = Math.floor((@sourceTone.green * a + @targetTone.green * (255 - a)) / 255)
        @object.tone.blue = Math.floor((@sourceTone.blue * a + @targetTone.blue * (255 - a)) / 255)
        @object.tone.grey = Math.floor((@sourceTone.grey * a + @targetTone.grey * (255 - a)) / 255)
        
        if not @easing.isRunning
            @callback?(@object, this)
        
    
    ###*
    * Starts the tint-animation.
    *
    * @method start
    * @param {gs.Tone} tone The target-tone.
    * @param {number} duration The duration in frames.
    * @param {Object} easingType The easing-type.
    * @param {function} [callback] An optional callback called if the animation is finished. 
    ### 
    start: (tone, duration, easing, callback) ->

        @callback = callback
        if @object.tone.red == tone.red and @object.tone.green == tone.green and 
            @object.tone.blue == tone.blue and @object.tone.grey == tone.grey
           @callback?(@object, this)
           
        if duration == 0 or @isInstantSkip()
            @object.tone = tone
            @callback?(@object, this)
        else
            @sourceTone = new Tone(@object.tone)
            @targetTone = tone
            @callback = callback
            @easing.type = easing
            @easing.startValue(255, -255, duration)
        
gs.Component_TintAnimation = Component_TintAnimation
